website_summaries.verdict: An exceedingly popular set recognized for its affordability and impressive construction.
pros: Compares well with other high-quality brands
Razor-sharp blade right out of package
Sturdy feel makes for easy handling
cons: A little heavy for some users, but well-balanced nonetheless
A gamble when it comes to durability

customer_reviews.title: Very Sharp. Very Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Sharp. Very Sharp and sturdy. Both the knife and fork are one individual piece making it even more sturdy and easy to use. I carved a 21lb turkey in record time. No mess. No fuss. Slices nice and thin slices. It's like the turkey was butter. There was no need to sharpen this, was ready to use right out of the package. I am thoroughly pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory B. Horne

customer_reviews.title: So easy to cut
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Got this near Thanksgiving and it made cutting the turkey so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Rosanna

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I have the Top Chef cutlery set and I’ve had it for years, but it does not include the carving knife and fork. When I saw this, I knew I had to have it because of the quality of the cutlery set I already own.
customer_reviews.author: Very happy customer!

customer_reviews.title: I am impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent work of art in craftmenship. It is a very sharp knife and fork is thick and well built.
customer_reviews.author: James C.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set! I have not used it yet but ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set! I have not used it yet but it is excellent quality, not cheap has a good weight to it for a good grip while cutting. Very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia B.

customer_reviews.title: It slices, it dices
customer_reviews.text: Great for Thanksgiving- nice quality! Perfect for my small hands.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn F.

customer_reviews.title: Razor sharp and well balanced. Bought specifically for Thanksgiving ...
customer_reviews.text: Razor sharp and well balanced. Bought specifically for Thanksgiving and it did the job more effectively than any other knife I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan&Dan

customer_reviews.title: It's a very well made set and is easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband as a Christmas gift. It's a very well made set and is easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi W.

customer_reviews.title: Carved that Christmas bird up like a Samurai
customer_reviews.text: chop, chop suey! Sharp as h*ll! Be careful. Carved that Christmas bird up like a Samurai!
customer_reviews.author: Thelonious

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to use and the knife cuts clean cuts.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice carving set. The knife cuts clean cuts. It would make a very nice gift for someone.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Carman

customer_reviews.title: Great Carving Set Folks
customer_reviews.text: This set carved our Christmas ham like a champ. Great knife and as a matter of fact, all the Top Chef cutlery we have purchased is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: carbonic

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered because of the price and I was not disappointed. It handles very well and slices very thin portions which is the way I like it.
customer_reviews.author: westleyo

customer_reviews.title: He loved it. Handle is a little short if you ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for my husband. He loved it. Handle is a little short if you have large hands but otherwise worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa DeLoatch

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This set is designed for serious carving. It's heavy, durable stainless and I love using this set. I will say, however, the knife wasn't as sharp as I like, but that was just a matter of a few minutes with a sharpener. Hard to go wrong for this deal.
customer_reviews.author: Thorne HamstringTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This carving set slices very well. Had more expensive sets that didn't slice as well. Good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bob M

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: received order on time. It was a gift. Good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: lb

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Love this set -- well made, sharp edge, nice weight and well balanced.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Saarikoski

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them!! Bought for a gift and kept a set for myself.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hargroder

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: I work in a restaurant kitchen and all my co-workers want to use these knives all the time. Great value too. Big thumbs up for these.
customer_reviews.author: Don Erix

customer_reviews.title: Great price for high quality
customer_reviews.text: Husband LOVES these. They cut beautifully and made cutting the turkey breast completely out to slice differently so easy. Made the turkey taste better cut that way as well. Very sturdy handles, great price for the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of boys

customer_reviews.title: Like butter
customer_reviews.text: Cut through the turkey like a hot knife through butter! Lol. Excellent!!!!
customer_reviews.author: daisy

customer_reviews.title: After the hubby butchered my beautiful Thanksgiving turkey with my old set I ordered this ...
customer_reviews.text: Why have I never bought a new carving set?? After the hubby butchered my beautiful Thanksgiving turkey with my old set I ordered this and I love it! Works well on meats!
customer_reviews.author: BabyOMimi

customer_reviews.title: High quality and sharp!
customer_reviews.text: Knife is extremely sharp and cut through prime rib, turkey, and ham like butter.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kwan

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful set. The knife is well balanced and holds an edge
customer_reviews.author: amanana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product as described and received in great condition. Great carving set. Sharp, durable and very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: They are excellent. Knife was nice and sharp
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for camping. They are excellent. Knife was nice and sharp
customer_reviews.author: Richard F Keyes

customer_reviews.title: VERY HAPPY
customer_reviews.text: Great set to go with the 15 piece set. I am very happy with both
customer_reviews.author: RONALD M JACKSON

customer_reviews.title: Future Chef
customer_reviews.text: My grandson said he wanted to attend culinary school and wanted a set of cutlery - he wrote me last week and said that this set if "awesome" he really enjoys using it has been fixing dinner for the family.
customer_reviews.author: Shashi

product_meta.title: Top Chef by Master Cutlery, 2-Piece Carving Set
product_meta.description: This officially licensed carving set will have you grilling like the pros. Like those used on Bravo's top-rated Top Chef program, this carving set features ice-tempered stainless steel.
feature_bullets: Product features: ice-tempered x30cr13 stainless steel hollow ground to reduce sticking
Full steel handle with seamless bonded and polished bolsters and non-slip surface laser etched "top chef" logo
Fork dimensions: 11.8 by .6 by 1" 8" carving knife: blade length: 8" handle length: 4.6" overall dimensions: 12.6 by .6 by 1.18"
Package dimensions: 1.0inches L x 1.0inches W x 1.0inches H

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars109 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
